document.full_text: the pennsylvania governor's office asked the environmental protection agency (epa) for a waiver to sell winter-grade gasoline until may 31 in a letter filed on thursday.
document.title: pennsylvania asks for a waiver on gasoline grade
lines_and_colors: the pennsylvania governor's office asked the environmental protection agency (epa) for a waiver to sell winter-grade gasoline until may 31 in a letter filed on thursday.
